name: The Odin Project
tagline: Revision for JS, CSS and HTML5
body:
# Going back to the fundamental front-end 101

### Workshop 1 - Project: Creating an Image Carousel/Slider
It should contain arrows on each side to advance the image forward or backwards. It should automatically move forward every 5 seconds. It should contain the little navigation circles at the bottom that indicate which slide you are on (and they should be click-able to advance to that particular slide).

[Source Code](https://github.com/MIML/TheOdinProject/tree/master/Carousel) | [Demo](http://miml.github.io/TheOdinProject/Carousel)

Tips:
The parseInt() function parses a string and returns an integer.

### Workshop 2 - Project: Creating an online calculator


### Workshop 3 - Project: Create a classic online game - Snake
It's a snake that you have to move around the board and which grows longer with each piece of food it eats. You lose if it gets so big it hits itself or if it goes off the board.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
